    Vedic Astrologer & Vaastu consultant

    Aacharya Om Shah

    Aacharya Om Shah is a Gold Medalist Astrologer from K.N.Rao Institute of Astrology, Bharati Vidya Bhavan, New Delhi.

    He holds M.A. (Astrology) and Diploma in (Vaastu Shastra) and (Medical Astrology) from BVB Delhi and SLBS National Sanskrit University, respectively. Aacharya Shah is an ex-microbiologist , M.Sc. (Microbiology) and Pre-PhD (Molecular Medicine).

    With Over 6 years of experience in Vedic Astrology and Vaastu Shastra, he brings remarkable changes in one's life using his astrological predictions, Vaastu, and karmic remedies.

    ₹6,000 + 18% GST

    Detailed astrological guidance for one full year. This analysis utilizes your Janma Kundali (parashari and jaimini systems) combined with your Varsha Kundali to predict yearly trends.

    Muhurta Selection

    ₹6,000 + 18% GST

    Identification of the most auspicious moments for significant life events, including marriage, travel, Griha Pravesh, and business inaugurations.

    Residential Vaastu Analysis

    Commercial Vaastu Analysis

    ₹20 / sq. ft + 18% GST.
